heading: HB08294
0: AN ACT UPGRADING THE SALARIES OF EMPLOYEES OF THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS
principal-authors: NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.; MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ; MARTINEZ, ERIC M.; SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S.; MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R.; OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.; CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.;
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2018-09-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08294
FULL TITLE : AN ACT UPGRADING THE SALARIES OF EMPLOYEES OF THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS
ABSTRACT : Proposes to increase the salary grades of field COMELEC employees such as Contested Ballot Box Custodians; Election Assistants; Election Officers and Field Officers (within and outside the NCR); Election Precincts Analysts; Regional Election Attorney; and Provincial Elections Supervisors. Aims to reclassifies and upgrades all remaining rank and file plantilla positions in the main and field offices, including casual employees.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ, MARTINEZ, ERIC M., SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S., MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R., OLIVAREZ, ERIC L., CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
